reviews.sentence: Exceptional. Fire alarms in every room and halls went off at 130 pm and again at 30 pm waking us up. Fire trucks arrived. Someone set off the alarm by smoking in a nonsmoking room. We were not given any compensation for the disruption twice in one night.

NO CUSTOMER RELATIONS. IT IS WHAT IT IS TAKE IT OR LEAVE IT. The afternoon we checked in the desk clerk was rude. We asked for a non smoking room. Her response was I just booked the last one. She was the manager. Take it or leave it or go somewhere else was her mantra. The lobby where the elevator was located always had at least 5 7 people waiting not including the luggage trolleys. We took the stairs. IT WAS SLOW. Breakfast was cold but at least there was coffee. The hall upstairs smelled of stale smoke.

I stayed in the comfort inn and suites on congare rd on the night of December 26. I made a reservation and was checked in just fine. There was not even any wait before my check in. I had a one king bed jacuzi suite. It was a non smoking room and the room hall did not smell at all. When I arrived in my room I was satisfied. The jacuzi was in the corner of the room which I liked because I could watch TV while soaking. My only small complaint was that the shower would not turn to when a warm setting like the handle was broke. That was fine because of the jacuzi though. I went to a get together for work a couple hours after arriving. Then got back to the room and basically passed out. Overall I would say I was very satisfied with the place.

I will never stay here again. You have to keep calling to ask to speak to a manager and they will lie and say the manager is not there when she is. And they bother you when you and your dogs stay because they claim their are complaints for them barking. But their were kids running up and down the hall doors being slammed constantly so that is why the dog was barking all of the notice that was going on outside. The sheets were itchy and the bathroom could have been cleaner. The people who work their including manager have an attitude. Breakfast is ok but do not care for the fake sausage and eggs.

CHOOSE OTHER HOTEL. NOTHINGAcept the cockroach in the bath room I had to spent the night with the hotel double charged me and did not respond to my mail My colleague was interrupted midnight by another guest trying to entre due to reception mistake and had to answer stupid questions by the receptionistTerible hotel.
Pretty great. Comfy bed. Great staff. Bathroom could be a little cleaner. A lot of hallway noice.

I had family and a large group of friends come in from out of town on Friday March 11 and when we returned to the hotel after a hockey game there was a large group of people hanging outside the entrance drinking beer and throwing the bottles into the bushes and revving their motorcycles loudly. My guests said that the party had guests on all floors and were loud and fighting as late as 330am. The front desk staff did nothing about it. My guests did not feel safe nor did they feel respected by the hotel staff. Also the rooms had safes but they did not lock and the computers in the lobby were slow and would not print. Overall a crappy hotel. but I guess what can you expect from a 2star hotel.
Room is nice and clean everything is working properly. Elevator is questionable hot and humid. Brezeway is stuffy.

Unfortunate Construction Zone. This is a very nice hotel clean nicely decorated and a decent breakfast. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Unfortunately the hotel is being renovated and many of the amenities ie TV Internet were not working in some rooms I heard several complaints but fortunately my room was fine. The new concrete in entrance way and paving stones on entrance drive were being sealed with a protective coat this morning when I was trying to have breakfast. The front entrance was the only entry exit and the VERY strong chemical smell lasted for an hour or better. My suggestion is to Close this hotel during those periods when they are using strong chemicals. They might do this work after breakfast maybe mid afternoon or late in the evening when guests are not in and out the front entrance. A large fan near the front entrance Blowing away from the lobby would have been helpful or an alternative entry exit. Honestly the staff working the front desk must have monster headaches this evening. I would recommend this hotel to friends NEXT YEAR certainly not this summer. Until construction is complete i would avoid the hotel. Friendly Staff and cleanliness. Location was just off I385 convenient. do not open during renovation.

Our company stays here quite a bit. They are very accommodating and employees have always been friendly at the front desk. The layout is weird though. The property slopes and the 3rd floor is ground floor in the rear of the building. With only one elevator in the front for all floors you may want to drive around back and park there depending where your room is.
I found the facility to be very accommodating. The shower. Location was good for my needs. Breakfast. The lack of a good reading chair. The fan noice at any setting. The lack of a bar and restaurant.
Friendly staff. Clean and Brand new facility. Nothing.

Staff member Nick was very helpful professional and our over all experience great. Comfy bed clean spacious great amenities Breakfast tasty. Suggestion for room. move your ice bucket center from bathroom that is right at the toilet to the desk areaSugestion for breakfast keep check on juicer. our OJ was fermented.
Exceptional. Very reasonably priced. Nice facility courteous staff good value. Appreciated that cancellation could be made at the last minute in case something had come up.

We loved it. A well run hotel that is close and convenient to shopping and restaurants. Everything was great. Very nice and nice size rooms. Clean modern great lighting in the hallways quite. Everytime we come to Greenville. we stay here. They have a good HOT breakfast. Only thing is a shuttle service would be a nice feature but it is no deal breaker of not staying. Our choice everytimeI needed to get another key for the room the desk person did not ask for ID. That needs to be enforced but we had to get another key and that person did ask for ID.
Very Good. Friendly staff available amenities and grocery items clean and quiet room refrigerator and microwave nice bathroom close to restaurants and shopping easy checkout.

Great accommodations and enjoyable experience. I had a suite with a king bed and was pleasantly surprised to find that the bedroom was in a separate room with no window which made for a better sleeping experience. The living area was spacious and I liked the large walk in shower. The staff were friendly and the breakfast was very good. Will definitely visit again.
Great place to stay. I like the bed. The clean rooms and hallways. The clean lobby. The pool is outside.
the breakfast and the gym was great for my stay experience. breakfast was great location great. i will most definitely be backeverything was great and i had no bad experience with my stay.

Great value and wonderful accommodations. We are on day ten of a road trip this is our fourth hotel. The room size layout cleanliness comfort oh my that bed. meets. exceeds our experience in resort hotels that charged 2 3 times more. We usually stay downtown when we visit Greenville. Of course the view and convenience to downtown attractions is not comparable but neither is the price. We will definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family visiting the area. We look forward to staying here again.
